Patients with DH may also experience dental enamel defects to permanent teeth, which is another manifestation of celiac disease. Less than 20 percent of people with DH have symptoms of celiac disease.3",NIDDK,Dermatitis Herpetiformis: Skin Manifestation of Celiac Disease (For Health Care Professionals)
